Banner.Description: I am a Generative AI Engineer specializing in building and development end-to-end, production-ready LLM applications. My expertise covers the full development lifecycle, from designing scalable data ingestion pipelines to orchestrating sophisticated agentic workflows. I leverage Python, LangChain, LangGraph, and FastAPI to build robust RAG systems that deliver high-fidelity, context-aware results. My focus is on engineering modular and efficient solutions that are both technically robust and aligned with business goals.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I build practical and powerful intelligent systems, with expertise across the full AI lifecycle from data ingestion to agent deployment. My focus is on engineering modular, reusable solutions using Python, FastAPI, LangChain, LangGraph and Google ADK to accelerate development and empower teams. With a strong command of data technologies like Neo4j and MongoDB and a background in Angular, I effectively bridge the gap between complex AI services and the end-user experience.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: GenAI Engineer
Description: Engineered and deployed RAG systems to power conversational AI assistants.
Architected and implemented a scalable data ingestion pipeline to automatically parse, chunk, and vectorize diverse document formats.
Developed a modular, reusable service using Python and FastAPI for AI assistant creation, significantly accelerating the prototyping and deployment lifecycle
Implemented high-performance RESTful APIs and Server-sent event APIs using Python and FastAPI to serve LLM agents and expose AI functionalities to client-side applications.
Implemented advanced RAG techniques to query a proprietary knowledge base of complex documents, ensuring high-fidelity and context-aware responses.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular Devloper
Description: Developed responsive web applications for various clients using Angular and TypeScript.
Built libraries of reusable UI components to accelerate and standardize development.
Integrated custom and third-party RESTful APIs to handle dynamic data and functionality.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: MALY

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Deloitte's AI Tax Assistant
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Deloitte's AI Tax Assistant is a specialized RAG assistant to provide accurate MENA tax information and summarize complex legal documents, leveraging Deloitte's proprietary knowledge base for high-fidelity retrieval.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MALY's Luna
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Luna is a conversational AI assistant using RAG to deliver personalized, context-aware answers to financial and Maly-related questions.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: AI4ALL
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: AI4ALL is a modular service to accelerate the prototyping and deployment of AI assistants, significantly reducing the time-to-delivery for new AI solutions across the company from days or weeks to hours.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MALY's data ingestion pipeline
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Ingestion pipeline is a project to automate file-to-vector embedding conversion for AI assistant knowledge bases, forming the core of Maly’s RAG architecture for consistent and efficient information retrieval across all applications.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Fruitful Tree Count Management
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Full-stack farm management system uses Computer Vision, specifically low-cost spectral signature recognition on satellite images, for automated fruit tree counting, change detection using Google Earth Engine and comprehensive farm management services.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
